title: [feature request] support a `set` of indexes
body_html:
In [76]: x = th.zeros(5)

In [77]: x[{2,3}]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
IndexError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-77-f60b906fb972> in <module>()
----> 1 x[{2,3}]

IndexError: only integers, slices (`:`), ellipsis (`...`), None and long or byte Variables are valid indices (got set)

In [78]: th.__version__
Out[78]: '0.4.0'
